thread.title: Akufo-Addo Takes 'Rise And Build' Tour To Kumasi
thread.title_full: Akufo-Addo Takes 'Rise And Build' Tour To Kumasi

title: Akufo-Addo Takes 'Rise And Build' Tour To Kumasi
text:
Politics | 4 October 2015 22:01 CET Akufo-Addo Takes 'Rise And Build' Tour To Kumasi By StarrFMOnline 
The presidential candidate of the New Patriotic Party, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, storms the party's stronghold the Ashanti region next week to conclude the last leg of the first phase of the 'Rise and Build Tour.' 
Before then he is expected to be in the Brong Ahafo region Monday. 
The month-long tour, which began on September 3, 2015, has seen him visit, so far, seven regions - Volta, Eastern, Upper West, Upper East, Northern, Western and Central. 
In the three regions, he will, amongst others, hold meetings with regional and constituency executives, as well as with aspirants in the NPP parliamentary primaries, both winners and losers, in order to foster co-operation amongst them as the basis for a successful 2016 campaign. 
Nana Akufo-Addo will end the first phase of his 'Rise and Build Tour' on Monday, October 12, 2015, with the Greater Accra Region being his last port of call.
